doc.title: Kamisama mousukoshi dake
doc.plot: This story involves Masaki, a high school student who idolizes Keigo, a music producer. To obtain one of his concert tickets, she sells her body and contracts HIV. Masaki loves Keigo and Keigo eventually admits to being in love with her. They over come obstacles to be together in the time she has left to live. The story makes the awareness of the HIV/AIDS issue.
